content:
Cuyana is a great brand for minimalist and high-quality essentials.

If you're looking for similar brands, here are a few options you might enjoy:

1. **Everlane**: Known for their transparent pricing and sustainable practices, Everlane offers a range of minimalist white shirts with a focus on quality and comfort.
2. **J.Crew**: While not entirely minimalist, J.Crew has a "Toothpick" collection that features simple, high-quality white shirts with a classic fit.
3. **Madewell**: This brand is popular for their denim, but they also offer a range of simple, well-made white shirts with a relaxed fit.
4. **Cos**: This Swedish brand is all about minimalist, modern design. They offer a range of high-quality white shirts with a focus on clean lines and simplicity.
5. **Acne Studios**: This fashion brand offers a range of minimalist white shirts with a focus on quality materials and attention to detail.

These brands all offer high-quality, minimalist designs that might appeal to you if you like Cuyana. You can check out their websites or visit their stores to see which one resonates with you the most.

Before making a purchase, you might want to read reviews and check the sizing charts to ensure the best fit.
